Navigation
Name Tutor/Concept/Name
Synopsis The name of a concept.
Syntax Name: ConceptName (mandatory)
Description Name defines the short name of a concept. A name starts with a letter and may contain letters and digits. Concept names are used to
  • Identify a concept: The full name of a concept is the path name from the root concept to the current concept.
  • Refer to other concepts: when unambiguous the short name can be used to refer to another concept, otherwise a sufficient part of the concept name has to be given to make it unambiguous.
Name is mandatory.
Examples The first line of this concept is:

Name: Name

Note that the displayed name Tutor/Concept/Name has been generated automatically.
